input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 2''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Northlight 3' Medium Mixed Classic Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 12' Hinged Tree with 1500 Clear Lights'
  - Name='Puleo 4.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='HOMCOM 7 FT Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches, and 865 Tips'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree'
  - Name='Costway 5ft Unlit 350 Branch Tips Foldable Metal Stand Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 7.5 ft. Unlit Flocked Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Vickerman Brighton Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Duxbury Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='King of Christmas 9 ft Rushmore Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Canadian Grande Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Norway Fir Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Bellevue Fraser Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Full Sierra Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 3' Metallic Purple Tinsel Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 3' Medium Mixed Classic Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, smaller size, different tree species (Mixed Classic Pine vs Dunhill Fir), but still an artificial Christmas tree serving a similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 12' Hinged Tree with 1500 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and model series Dunhill Fir, larger size with similar hinged branch construction and pre-lit feature, very high relevancy.
Different brand and smaller size, pre-lit artificial Christmas tree but no indication of same model or construction style, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM 7 FT Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches, and 865 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir tree shape with realistic branches and many tips, similar height but slim silhouette unlike wide full Dunhill Fir; unlit but otherwise similar purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with a fir tree of similar size, but different fir species (Norway Fir vs Dunhill Fir) which may have different branch structure and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with a fir tree of similar size, but different fir species (Norway Fir vs Dunhill Fir) which may have different branch structure and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 5ft Unlit 350 Branch Tips Foldable Metal Stand Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but similar features of foldable metal stand and decent branch tips amount; unlit and smaller height but otherwise serving the same use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 7.5 ft. Unlit Flocked Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species (Noble Fir), similar height, but unlit and flocked finish which may affect appearance; different brand but functionally similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Vickerman Brighton Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and pine species rather than fir, likely different branch tip density and fullness; still an artificial Christmas tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Duxbury Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but different model (Duxbury), likely similar quality and construction but different shape or branch design than Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King of Christmas 9 ft Rushmore Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but similar fir species, larger size, probably similar construction; functionally similar but brand/style differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Norway Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar tree species (Norway Fir), different brand, usability similar but likely varying branch structure and quality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Bellevue Fraser Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and unlit, but Fraser Fir is a similar species and it is an artificial Christmas tree, so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Full Sierra Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, same 'full' silhouette and Noble Fir species similar to Dunhill Fir, likely high similarity in style and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 3' Metallic Purple Tinsel Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very different style â€” metallic purple tinsel vs lifelike fir tree; small size and novelty design reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and size class with Norway Fir species, similar artificial Christmas tree category but different fir variety and possibly different fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and size class with Norway Fir species, similar artificial Christmas tree category but different fir variety and possibly different fullness.
